taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Echinochloa muricata (P. Beauv.) Fernald var. muricata

bio:treatment.description: Spikelets 3.5-5 mm. Lower glumes 1-2.6 mm; upper glumes 3-5 mm; lower lemmas usually awned, awns 6-16 mm, occasionally unawned; anthers 0.5-1.1 mm.
bio:treatment.discussion: Echinochloa muricata var. muricata is the common variety in eastern North America.
